titles.title: Stopping Abusive Student Loan Collection Practices in Bankruptcy Act of 2014
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to stop abusive student loan collection practices in bankruptcy cases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/11/2014--Introduced. Stopping Abusive Student Loan Collection Practices in Bankruptcy Act of 2014 - Amends federal bankruptcy law to allow an individual whose student loan debt is discharged due to undue hardship to recover the costs of, and a reasonable attorney's fee for, the discharge proceeding if the court finds that the position of the creditor was not substantially justified.
